title: For loops
description:
In C++, there is another type of loop called a for loop. It is often used when the number of iterations is known beforehand. you make a for loop by writing for (type init = value; condition; increment init) {code}

Make a for loop that exits after 5 iterations and prints 'hello from cbit' every time.
expectedOutput: hello from cbithello from cbithello from cbithello from cbithello from cbit
